text: Didier Robert (born 26 April 1964) is a French politician who is a member of the Republicans party. He represents the island of Réunion, and was a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. Robert has served as President of the Regional Council of Réunion since 26 March 2010, succeeding Paul Vergès. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Regional Council of Réunion Category:Members of the Regional Council of Réunion Category:Politicians of Réunion Category:Sciences Po Aix alumni Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Senators of Réunion Category:People from Saint-Pierre, Réunion
title: Didier Robert
